Digital Twin of 5G Network

log_watcher module

Module for real-time classification of UC using logs from Open5GS AMF. Performs LSTM inference, confidence evaluation and online fine-tuning.

class log_watcher.AttentionLayer(*args, **kwargs)

Bases: Layer

build(input_shape)
call(x)
compute_output_shape(input_shape)
log_watcher.clean_old_models(directory='/app/data/Model', keep_last_n=7, pattern='Model_bn_*.keras')

Keep only the last keep_last_n saved model files and delete older ones.

log_watcher.load_last_sequence(csv_path, selected_features, sequence_length=60)

Load the last sequence of records from CSV, ensuring all required features and labels are present.

log_watcher.main_loop(interval=1, prometheus_port=9000)

Main loop that monitors UE activity, parses logs, updates Prometheus metrics, and fine-tunes the model in real-time.

log_watcher.parse_amf(lines, previous_state)

Parse AMF log lines to extract UE registration and deregistration events, update UE states, and compute registration/session durations.

log_watcher.predict_current_uc(latest_window_df)

Predict the current use case (UC) using the loaded LSTM model based on the latest data window.

log_watcher.remove_offset()

Remove the offset file used by Pygtail to start reading the log file from the beginning.

log_watcher.run_main_notebook_with_backup()

Execute the main.ipynb notebook, log its execution, truncate CSV, and periodically create CSV backups.

log_watcher.run_notebook_in_thread()

Run the main.ipynb notebook in a separate daemon thread.

log_watcher.save_model_with_date(model, path_prefix='/app/data/Model/Model_bn_')

Save the current model to disk with the current date as part of the filename.

log_watcher.truncate_running_data(csv_path, keep_last_n=60)

Truncate the given CSV file to keep only the last keep_last_n rows.
